Package game.items

Interface Tradeable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bloodberry, BroadSword, GiantHammer, GreatKnife, HealingVial, RefreshingFlask, TradeableItem, TradeableWeaponItem
public interface Tradeable
An interface representing a tradeable item or entity. It defines methods for setting and retrieving the price, spawning a new item, checking if the price is affected, determining the scam type, and calculating the affected price.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int affectedPrice​(Actor seller)
    Calculate the affected price of the tradeable item based on specific conditions.
    int getPrice()
    Get the price of the tradeable item.
    java.lang.Enum<TradeCharacteristics> getScamType​(Actor seller)
    Get the scam type associated with the tradeable item.
    boolean isPriceAffected​(Actor seller)
    Check if the price of the tradeable item is affected by certain conditions.
    Item setPrice​(int price)
    Set the price of the tradeable item.
    Item spawn()
    Spawn a new instance of the tradeable item.

  • Method Details

    • getPrice

      int getPrice()
      Get the price of the tradeable item.
      Returns:
      The price of the tradeable item.

    • setPrice

      Item setPrice​(int price)
      Set the price of the tradeable item.
      Parameters:
      price - The new price of the tradeable item.
      Returns:
      The updated tradeable item with the new price.

    • spawn

      Item spawn()
      Spawn a new instance of the tradeable item.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the tradeable item.

    • isPriceAffected

      boolean isPriceAffected​(Actor seller)
      Check if the price of the tradeable item is affected by certain conditions.
      Parameters:
      seller - The actor representing the seller.
      Returns:
      true if the price is affected, false otherwise.

    • getScamType

      java.lang.Enum<TradeCharacteristics> getScamType​(Actor seller)
      Get the scam type associated with the tradeable item.
      Parameters:
      seller - The actor representing the seller.
      Returns:
      The scam type as an enum value from TradeCharacteristics.

    • affectedPrice

      int affectedPrice​(Actor seller)
      Calculate the affected price of the tradeable item based on specific conditions.
      Parameters:
      seller - The actor representing the seller.
      Returns:
      The affected price of the tradeable item.
